item.title: 5. Sources
item.description: Authentication (last accessed January 8, 2022): https://www.techtarget.com/searchsecurity/definition/authentication Identification and Authentication Failures (last accessed January 9, 2022): https://owasp.org/Top10/A07_2021-Identification_and_Authentication_Failures/ What Is Certificate-Based Authentication and Why Should I Use It? (last accessed on January 8, 2022): https://www.globalsign.com/en/blog/what-is-certificate-based-authentication 5 Authentication Methods that Can Prevent the Next Breach (last accessed January 9, 2022): https://www.idrnd.ai/5-authentication-methods-that-can-prevent-the-next-breach/ The Ultimate Authentication Playbook (last accessed January 9, 2022): https://www.okta.com/blog/2019/02/the-ultimate-authentication-playbook/ Web Authentication Methods Compared (last accessed January 9, 2022): https://testdriven.io/blog/web-authentication-methods/ Authentication for web applications (last accessed January 9, 2022): http://web.
